channel.title: CVE Feed for Kubernetes -- kubelet
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kubernetes -- kubelet

item.title: CVE-2023-3676|2024-08-02T07:01:57.315Z -- kubernetes -- kubelet
item.description: A security issue was discovered in Kubernetes where a user that can create pods on Windows nodes may be able to escalate to admin privileges on those nodes. Kubernetes clusters are only affected if they include Windows nodes.
